name: Fudge Walnut Brownies
author: Yoly
summary: These are quick and easy to make. Everyone just loves these brownies.
ingredients: 2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened baking chocolate, melted
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Sift flour, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Beat sugar and butter together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy
Beat in eggs until smooth batter forms; beat in chocolate and vanilla extract
Stir flour mixture in just until incorporated; fold in walnuts
Spread batter into prepared square pan
Bake in preheated oven until top is dry and edges have started to pull away from the sides of the pan, 40 to 45 minutes
Cool completely in square pan, about 30 minutes; cut into 9 squares
